channel.title: Wilderness help please!
channel.description:
Hello,
I was wondering where i should put my wilderness warning sign in the client.java.
So when i enter the wildy the warning sign appears and then dissapears when i walk further north.
Help would be apreciated thank you.

item.title: Wilderness help please!
item.dc:creator: @SirPali SirPali
item.description:
@SirPali wrote:

[quote=“pk george1, post:5, topic:328926”]Thank you very much for your help if i coudl rep i would but cant lol.

I changed it to showinterface and it works now idk why that part of yours wouldnt work but thanks again[/quote]

Thats because not all sources have sendFrame126 Some sources do, some don’t, seems like yours didn’t.
Good to see you fixed it yourself though

Good luck with the rest of your server!

Read full topic

item.title: Wilderness help please!
item.dc:creator: @pk_george1 pk george1
item.description:
@pk_george1 wrote:

Thank you very much for your help if i coudl rep i would but cant lol.

item.title: Wilderness help please!
item.dc:creator: @SirPali SirPali
item.description:
@SirPali wrote:

In client.java, search for

 public boolean process()

In it, add this:

// This send the wilderness-warning interface when on the edge of the wilderness. if (absY == 3523) { sendFrame126("", 1908); }

That should do it =D

Read full topic

item.title: Wilderness help please!
item.dc:creator: @pk_george1 pk george1
item.description:
@pk_george1 wrote:

kk thanks shall i get the y co-ord from the public boolean isinwilderness ?

Where exactly shall i add it in client.java and btw my y coord is 3523.

Read full topic

item.title: Wilderness help please!
item.dc:creator: @SirPali SirPali
item.description:
@SirPali wrote:

Find the exact Y coordinate where the wilderness begins, when the player’s Y coordinate is the same as the one where the wilderness begins, add a code that does this:

if(absY == WildernessStart) { // With WildernessStart is the coordinate of the wilderness start, ofcourse
sendFrame126("",1908); 
}

I didn’t test this, but that should send the wilderness warning interface.

Good luck!

Read full topic
